text: Martin Bianchi (born 11 February 1981) is an Argentine cross-country skier. He competed in the men's 15 kilometre classical event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Argentina Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Martin Bianchi
